#id=1
#text=Last week I decided that I wanted to get a haircut .
#id=2
#text=I called my hairstylist and made an appointment to come in .
#id=3
#text=On the day of my appointment I drove to the salon , checked in with the receptionist and sat down and looked through a magazine for a few minutes until the stylist came out and called my name .
#id=4
#text=I followed her back to her booth where she sat me in a spinning chair in front of a mirror .
#id=5
#text=She asked me questions about how I wanted my hair cut and I explained it to her .
#id=6
#text=Then she took me to another chair in front of a small sink where she washed my hair .
#id=7
#text=When she was done , she wrapped my hair in a towel and took me back to the spinning chair .
#id=8
#text=She combed my hair and then began to cut it .
#id=9
#text=Once she was done , she blow-dried my hair .
#text=I looked in the mirror and was very happy with my new haircut .
#text=I thanked her and gave her a tip , went back to the receptionist to pay for the haircut , then went back out to my car and drove home .
